name: Finding Binky - Jammers Ep. 2
description:
Finding Binky Can you find binky?

Somewhere in this messy room is Binky. You'll have to click through the correct sequence of items to figure out which color of Binky we're looking for. Get it right? A brief hint will show you the next item. Get it wrong? You'll have to start the sequence over!

How fast can you find the correct Binky? Finding Binky was create as part of Jammers Podcast:

Jammers is a podcast dedicated to game design with a focus on game jams. This game was created entirely in 5 hours, as part of Episode 2, featuring Lloyd from Red Iron Labs. To find out more and check out the episode visit: jammerspodcast.com

Programming & Audio: Lloyd - Red Iron labs Art: Brett - LLimb Games & Jammers Podcast
